verses.t: The earth{H776} is Lord'sthe {H3068}, and the fulness{H4393} thereof; the world{H8398}, and they that dwell{H3427} therein.
For he hath founded{H3245} it upon the seas{H3220}, and established{H3559} it upon the floods{H5104}.
Who shall ascend{H5927} into the hill{H2022} Lordof the {H3068}? or who shall stand{H6965} in his holy{H6944} place{H4725}?

He that hath clean{H5355} hands{H3709}, and a pure{H1249} heart{H3824}; who hath not lifted up{H5375} his soul{H5315} unto vanity{H7723}, nor sworn{H7650} deceitfully{H4820}.Heâ€¦: Heb. The clean of hands
He shall receive{H5375} the blessing{H1293} Lordfrom the {H3068}, and righteousness{H6666} from the God{H430} of his salvation{H3468}.
This is the generation{H1755} of them that seek{H1875} him, that seek{H1245} thy face{H6440}, O Jacob{H3290}. Selah{H5542}.O Jacob: or, O God of Jacob
Lift up{H5375} your heads{H7218}, O ye gates{H8179}; and be ye lift up{H5375}, ye everlasting{H5769} doors{H6607}; and the King{H4428} of glory{H3519} shall come in{H935}.
Who is this King{H4428} of glory{H3519}? LordThe {H3068} strong{H5808} and mighty{H1368}, Lordthe {H3068} mighty{H1368} in battle{H4421}.
Lift up{H5375} your heads{H7218}, O ye gates{H8179}; even lift them up{H5375}, ye everlasting{H5769} doors{H6607}; and the King{H4428} of glory{H3519} shall come in{H935}.
Who is this King{H4428} of glory{H3519}? LordThe {H3068} of hosts{H6635}, he is the King{H4428} of glory{H3519}. Selah{H5542}.
